## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                    | Type                                                                                                                                                                            | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`         | `alt`          | Custom alternative text                        | `string`                                                                                                                                                                        | `undefined` |
| `avatarColor` | `avatar-color` | Avatar color (semantic tokens)                 | `"almond" \| "blue" \| "cherry" \| "cyan" \| "error" \| "green" \| "grey" \| "indigo" \| "info" \| "orange" \| "pink" \| "red" \| "sage" \| "success" \| "warning" \| "yellow"` | `'sage'`    |
| `icon`        | `icon`         | Font Awesome icon class (ex: "fas fa-user")    | `string`                                                                                                                                                                        | `undefined` |
| `name`        | `name`         | Full name used to generate initials            | `string`                                                                                                                                                                        | `''`        |
| `size`        | `size`         | Taille du composant                            | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                                                                                                                                | `'medium'`  |
| `src`         | `src`          | URL de l'image                                 | `string`                                                                                                                                                                        | `undefined` |
| `status`      | `status`       | Status displayed inside the badge              | `"away" \| "busy" \| "none" \| "offline" \| "online"`                                                                                                                           | `'none'`    |
| `variant`     | `variant`      | Variant: primary or secondary                  | `"primary" \| "secondary"`                                                                                                                                                      | `'primary'` |
